name: Erina Defender
description: The Erina Defender is a small humanoid with a chain shirt and protective instincts, capable of burrowing.
memorable: Notable for its ability to protect allies and resist poison damage, enhancing its role in battles.
goals: Primarily aims to protect its allies during combat.
relations: May be allied with other protective creatures or serve in small groups to defend areas.
environment: Typically found in regions where they can guard others, often in burrowing terrains.
strengths: Has advantage on saving throws against poison and can impose disadvantage on attacks targeting allies.
weaknesses: Average offensive capability, reliant on teamwork for effectiveness in combat.
attacks: Can perform two attacks with a Shortsword or Shortbow, dealing piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Protective Interference, which helps defend allies from attacks.
equipment: Wears a chain shirt for armor and wields a Shortsword and Shortbow.
senses: Possesses Keen Smell, granting it advantage on smell-related Perception checks.
skills: Proficient in Athletics and Perception, enhancing its physical and awareness capabilities.
additional_information: Advantages on saving throws against poison enhance survivability.
Can effectively track enemies thanks to Keen Smell.
Flexible in combat with options for melee and ranged attacks.
Average Dexterity and Constitution support initiative and health.
Relies on positioning and teamwork to maximize its protective capabilities.
